title: Saints Row Gets Delayed  - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.17.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Saints Row's delay, Streamlabs OBS drama, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start﻿
00:09:18 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now and it’s our impressions of Pokemon Brilliant Diamond & Shining Pearl AND Halo Infinite so far. You can catch that over on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
Our Spider-Man No Way Home Trailer Reactions are up right now. It’s Tim, Andy, Nick, and the RETURN of Greg Miller reacting to the brand new trailer. That’s up right now on youtube.com/KindaFunny
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:10:58 - Saints Row reboot gets pushed back to August 2022 - Daniel Cooper @ Engadget
00:23:30 - Streamlabs has been accused of copying material for its console streaming platform - Jon Fingas @ Engadget
00:30:20 - Ad
00:34:45 - Another Activision-Blizzard Update: A group of Activision Blizzard shareholders joins call for CEO Bobby Kotick’s resignation - Shannon Liao @ Washington Post
00:41:04 - Yakuza’a studio is working on a new franchise - Jordan Middler @ Video Games Chronicle
00:46:15 - Xbox Cloud Gaming now available on Xbox Series X and Xbox One - News.Xbox.com
00:50:40 - Out today
 Reader mail  -
00:54:04 - The game awards nominees came out yesterday and much to everyones "surprise" the internet is angry. However, for a change is there something to be upset about? Is their anger atleast somewhat justified? - Parker Petrov
01:04:00 - Squad Up:Kessel(PS) - Kesselwinks
01:05:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tam and Tim
